attributes.action: Bring back the birch for Juvinile criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kids today are not afraid of breaking the law. Some are not disciplined by their parents and have no reason to care for the laws of this country. I am proposing to Gordon Brown's government to hold a debate for this punishment. I believe a policy like this will be a vote winner and help the country in bring respect back to children lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
